api_teaser.title: morph by api
api_teaser.subtitle: Easily integrate MorphToken into your digital product. Here is an example for converting Ethereum to Bitcoin.

quickstart_guide.title: quickstart guide
quickstart_guide.caption: For more information and limits see [FAQ](/faq).

lines.primary: Choose asset to convert FROM and up to six assets to convert TO. (Click “Add Split” to add additional assets).
Define desired “Weights” to set how your assets will be divided.
When ready, click “Continue” to add addresses before starting the trade.
At this point you may still change assets and weights if desired.
When ready to continue, fill in your addresses and click *Start Trade*
Now send currency (defined on the left), to the deposit address at the bottom.

lines.secondary: Deposits are detected instantly and conversion happens immediately after confirmation.
If you experience any issue, please [Contact Us](/contact-us) and include the *Morph ID* displayed at the top (#PENMMGXL!BY in this example).
Only one deposit is accepted per trade. Additional deposits are refunded, see [FAQ](/faq) for more info.

subtitle_left: Safely split one digital asset into many others.
subtitle_right: Or simply convert one to another.
